Name: Nola Daiquiri
Ingredients: 52.5 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Review: Light rum and elderflower with the merest hint of orange and lemon juice.
History: Created in 2007 by Lynnette Marrero at Freeman's, New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Nola Daiquiri contains 166 calories
